creator: AimCrafters Software Pvt Ltd.
descriptionHtml:
Al Quran Word By Word –: Learn Quran Easily at home without any teacher, Simple learning , Easy Memorization of Holy Quran, Read and Listen Word by word Quran.

Unique Quran Learning App with Stylish and elegant high quality graphics. This App has unmatchable features and unique than all other apps on market. Completely FREE, no Ads, no unwanted notifications.

Al Quran Word By Word is a unique multi-language application with Translation, Tafseer and also provides Verse by Verse Audio Playback with repeat functions. The most exiting feature of this application is to bookmark individual Quranic words while reading and then memorize with the advanced memorizing tool under vocabulary tab. Once a word is bookmarked, it will be differentiated with a different colour even though if it is repeated again in full Quran to avoid duplicate bookmarking of difficult words.

This application supports, English, Urdu, Banga, Hindi and Bahasa (Malaysia) languages as of now. A powerful words memorizing tool with advance learning methods is included under vocabulary Tab which will help users to memorize the translation with no efforts.

Multi-language:
● Bengali, English, Hindi, Indonesian, Malay, and Urdu and many more will be added in the future. 
● Tafseer Ahsan Ul Bayan (Authentic Makki Tafseer) 
● Translation & Tafsir viewable simultaneously 


Word by word Translations & Tafseer:
● Word by Word Translation in English, Indonesian, Bangla, Urdu and Hindi based on Quran 
● Tafseer Ahsan Ul Bayan
● Makkah Translation   My Vocabulary (Word Translation Memorization):
● Select difficult words with one click and add them to study list.
Selected word will appear in different colour all over the Quran pages to avoid duplicate bookmarking.

All words are separated para-wise for easy selection and practice.
Learn Module: Will help you to memorize the words, using following tools.
Review It: System will show 5-20 selected words with transition to memorize the meaning.
Match It: will let you to match words with right translation to keep you focused.
Multiple Choice: Will show one Arabic word with different translation to select right one.
Recall It: Will show Arabic word only and let you to recall the meaning. Press show button once done to see your memoirzation.
One Game: You can select any one of the above module to practice all words in the same manner.
Auto Play: will play all the selected words in para automatically with translation for audio memorization.

Bookmarks:
● Bookmarks / Favourites  Ayah and words Categories by Para 
● Mark Verses as Last Read using Single Bookmark Feature, and keep track of Khatmah 
● Settings and bookmarks Import / Export feature to share across devices.  

Quran Majeed Audio:
 ● Audio mp3 full Quran Majeed 30 Juz or 114 Surah without limitations 
● Listen to several recitations by Sheikh Mishary Al Afasy 
● English and Urdu translation audio 
● Robust Audio System with repeat, group playback of verses function to aid in Quran Memorization / Quran Hifz.  

Quran Reading Options:
● Reading with Al Quran, Me Quran R3HOQ and Amiri  fonts 
● Read Quran in Mushaf Mode 
● Enable Translation and Tafsirs along with word to word translation. ● Custom colours for Arabic, Translation, Tafseer and word to word meanings 
● Autoscroll feature 
● Copy & Share the verses 

Disclamer: 
This app is based on authentic Ahle Sunnah translations. We believe that Prophet Muhammad PBUH is the last and final prophet and there is no prophet after him.
descriptionShort: App to Learn and practice Quran easily at home without any teacher.

Al Quran Word By Word is a unique multi-language application with Translation, Tafseer and also provides Verse by Verse Audio Playback with repeat functions. The most exiting feature of this application is to bookmark individual Quranic words while reading and then memorize with the advanced memorizing tool under vocabulary tab. Once a word is bookmarked, it will be differentiated with a different colour even though if it is repeated again in full Quran to avoid duplicate bookmarking of difficult words.

This application supports, English, Urdu, Banga, Hindi and Bahasa (Malaysia) languages as of now. A powerful words memorizing tool with advance learning methods is included under vocabulary Tab which will help users to memorize the translation with no efforts.

Multi-language:
● Bengali, English, Hindi, Indonesian, Malay, and Urdu and many more will be added in the future. 
● Tafseer Ahsan Ul Bayan (Authentic Makki Tafseer) 
● Translation & Tafsir viewable simultaneously 


Word by word Translations & Tafseer:
● Word by Word Translation in English, Indonesian, Bangla, Urdu and Hindi based on Quran 
● Tafseer Ahsan Ul Bayan
● Makkah Translation   My Vocabulary (Word Translation Memorization):
● Select difficult words with one click and add them to study list.
Selected word will appear in different colour all over the Quran pages to avoid duplicate bookmarking.

All words are separated para-wise for easy selection and practice.
Learn Module: Will help you to memorize the words, using following tools.
Review It: System will show 5-20 selected words with transition to memorize the meaning.
Match It: will let you to match words with right translation to keep you focused.
Multiple Choice: Will show one Arabic word with different translation to select right one.
Recall It: Will show Arabic word only and let you to recall the meaning. Press show button once done to see your memoirzation.
One Game: You can select any one of the above module to practice all words in the same manner.
Auto Play: will play all the selected words in para automatically with translation for audio memorization.

Bookmarks:
● Bookmarks / Favourites  Ayah and words Categories by Para 
● Mark Verses as Last Read using Single Bookmark Feature, and keep track of Khatmah 
● Settings and bookmarks Import / Export feature to share across devices.  

Quran Majeed Audio:
 ● Audio mp3 full Quran Majeed 30 Juz or 114 Surah without limitations 
● Listen to several recitations by Sheikh Mishary Al Afasy 
● English and Urdu translation audio 
● Robust Audio System with repeat, group playback of verses function to aid in Quran Memorization / Quran Hifz.  

Quran Reading Options:
● Reading with Al Quran, Me Quran R3HOQ and Amiri  fonts 
● Read Quran in Mushaf Mode 
● Enable Translation and Tafsirs along with word to word translation. ● Custom colours for Arabic, Translation, Tafseer and word to word meanings 
● Autoscroll feature 
● Copy & Share the verses 

Disclamer: 
This app is based on authentic Ahle Sunnah translations. We believe that Prophet Muhammad PBUH is the last and final prophet and there is no prophet after him.
descriptionShort: App to Learn and practice Quran easily at home without any teacher.
